title: Best of the Program | Guests: Kenneth Timmerman & Steve Deace | 1/6/20
description:
Glenn returns with much-needed perspective on the rumors of a draft and World War III. Meanwhile, even more new evidence suggests that Epstein didn’t kill himself. And with how rapidly technology is changing, it might not be a good time to buy a car. Investigative reporter Kenneth Timmerman sheds light on Iranian general Soleimani, his role in the 2012 Benghazi attack, and how Iranians celebrated his death. At last night’s Golden Globes, comedian Ricky Gervais ripped the hypocrisy of Hollywood’s elite. BlazeTV host and Iowan Steve Deace weighs in on the aging Joe Biden and what to expect in the Iowa caucuses.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
